pageContext.claim: “In New York, the first time where the deaths were less from the previous day. That's the first drop so far. So maybe that's a good sign; it could be. And the hospital levels are starting to perhaps decrease. It's been very short, but perhaps decrease.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is cherry-picking data. April 5 was not the first day that deaths in New York were lower than the previous day nor did this represent a trend The death rate continued to climb for weeks.
